Name: Kuchisake Onna - 口裂け女
About the game: Check this Spooky game out made by Nyxtales! It About Kuchisake-Onna! / You just woke up in a strange place, you can't remember anything, not even your name. Ritual books and weird notes are everywhere, strange things happen all over the place and the horrific noises are driving you crazy! Yet you're still trying to figure everything out, who are you? why are you there? why can't you remember anything? What to expect from Kuchisake Onna - 口裂け女: Atmospheric environment. Puzzles that actually make sense. Highly intelligent enemy AI. Great storytelling. Proper English. NO cheap jumpscares Please note that this game is not based of the urban legend, it just uses the Kuchisake Onna spirit as the enemy Gameplay is arround 30minutes
